name: Pong (2022)
description:
Ball and Paddle Designs were made by me using the website Piskel.com or the desktop app to which can also be downloaded.

Sound Effects were used by:

Mini Sound: 

https://creatorassets.com/a/8-bit-coin-sound-effects for the Score Sound Effect

Music was used by David Renda through the website: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

The fonts came from this website: https://www.1001freefonts.com/bitmap-pixel-fonts.php

And Background for this game are credited by NotjungCG from: 

https://stock.adobe.com/search/images?k=%228+bit%22&asset_id=338054496
